verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No blood, no altar now, The sacrifice is o'er! No flame, no smoke ascends on high, The lamb is slain no more, But richer blood has flowed from nobler veins, To purge the soul from guilt, and cleanse the reddest stains.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We thank Thee for the blood, The blood of Christ, Thy Son: The blood by which our peace is made, Our victory is won: Great victory o'er hell, and sin, and woe, That needs no second fight, and leaves no second foe.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We thank Thee for the grace, Descending from above, That overflows our widest guilt, The'eternal Father's love. Love of the Father's everlasting Son, Love of the Holy Ghost, Jehovah, Three in One.{/lang-eng}
